title: Mesut Ozil sends Arsene Wenger birthday message amid Arsenal woes under Unai Emery

Mesut Ozil has sent a birthday message to former Arsenal manager Arsene Wenger - less than a day after being snubbed by Unai Emery again.

The German was left out Emery's matchday squad for the visit to Sheffield United on Monday night, the fourth time in a row that his Spanish manager has decided to axe him.

The tactical decision didn't pay off though, as the Gunners endured a disappointing evening and ultimately suffered a 1-0 defeat to the relegation candidates.

And in another twist to this somewhat unsavoury saga, Ozil has taken to Instagram to wish Emery's predecessor Wenger a happy 70th birthday.

(Image: Mesut Ozil /Instagram)

Ozil posted a 'happy birthday' message to the legendary Frenchman, alongside a picture of the pair.

Wenger signed Ozil for Arsenal from Real Madrid back in 2013 and the pair are believed to have maintained their good relationship after the manager left the club last year.

Meanwhile, Sky Sports pundit Charlie Nicholas believes Ozil's absence from Emery's Arsenal team is due to the fact he is "not training hard enough".

Ozil, 31, has featured just twice for the Gunners in all competitions this season, raising eyebrows among many fans in the early stages of the season.

(Image: PA)

With several reports that the German's omissions are down to his performances in training, Nicholas suggested that the former Real Madrid star needs to put in more effort, but admitted he should still be involved.

Previewing Arsenal's Europa League clash with Vitoria SC on Thursday, which is expected to see Emery make several changes, Nicholas told Sky Sports : "Will he throw Mesut Ozil into this situation?

"I think Unai Emery knows Ozil is not training hard enough, so that is why he is not putting him in the team.

"He is still there so I would play him."
description: Mesut Ozil, who has fallen out of favour under Unai Emery, arrived at Arsenal under Arsene Wenger
